name: Lyon Estates Parkland
description: A sprawling 'eco-recreational zone' where a suburban habitation cluster once stood. The modular housing units have been efficiently recycled, replaced by a pristine, bio-engineered green space and a serene, hydro-filtered, man-made lake. The only preserved 'heritage artifacts' are a pair of gleaming white lion statues, their nano-paint perpetually refreshed, standing sentinel at the automated entrance. The air is thick with the bio-filtered scent of genetically optimized grass and the faint, almost imperceptible, hum of the climate-control system that maintains a state of perpetual, idealized spring. It's a place of meticulously crafted tranquility, yet one often experiences the subtle, unsettling sensation of traversing the data-ghosts of a thousand efficiently processed memories.
